name: Sea Spawn
languages: understands Aquan and Common but can\'t speak

traits.Limited Amphibiousness: The sea spawn can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the sea at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

actions.Multiattack: The sea spawn makes three attacks: two unarmed strikes and one with its Piscine Anatomy.
actions.Unarmed Strike: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Piscine Anatomy: The sea spawn has one or more of the following attack options, provided it has the appropriate anatomy:
